metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10980 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: GitLab EE/CE 8.0.rc1 to 12.9 is vulnerable to a blind SSRF in the FogBugz integration.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Affects GitLab EE/CE 8.0 and later.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
